sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-drawer
    :open="showDrawer"
    title="产品添加"
    placement="right"
    @after-open-change="afterOpenChange"
  >
    <a-form :model="formState" ref="formRef" @finish="onFinish">
      <a-form-item name="name" label="产品名称" :rules="[{ required: true, message: '请输入产品名称！' }]">
        <a-input v-model:value="formState.name" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item name="price" label="价格" :rules="[{ required: true, message: '请输入价格！' }]">
        <a-input v-model:value="formState.price" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item name="categories" label="类别">
        <a-radio-group v-model:value="formState.categories">
          <a-radio v-for="(item, index) in categoriesList" :key="index" :value="item.id">
            {{ item.name }}
          </a-radio>
        </a-radio-group>
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item>
        <a-button class="add" html-type="submit">添加</a-button>
        <a-button class="clear" html-type="reset" @click="onClear">清空</a-button>
      </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
  </a-drawer>
</template>

<script setup>
import { reactive, toRefs, defineProps, defineEmits } from 'vue';

// ✅ 接收父组件的 `showDrawer`
const props = defineProps({
  showDrawer: Boolean
});

// ✅ 事件触发器，通知父组件修改 `showDrawer`
const emit = defineEmits(['sync-drawer']);

// ✅ 让 `formState` 是响应式的
const dataSource = reactive({
  formState: {
    name: '',
    price: '',
    categories: ''
  }
});
const { formState } = toRefs(dataSource);

// ✅ 关闭抽屉时，通知父组件修改 `showDrawer`
const afterOpenChange = (val) => {
  if (!val) {
    emit('sync-drawer', false); // 发送 `false`，通知父组件关闭抽屉
  }
};
</script>
